mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.product_id AS "productId", a.product_price AS "productPrice", a.product_actual_price AS "productActualPrice", a.cabinet AS "cabinet", a.door AS "door", a.address AS "address", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.payment_time AS "paymentTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_goods( id, order_no, product_id, product_price, product_actual_price, cabinet, door, address, create_time, update_time, payment_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderNo}, #{productId}, #{productPrice}, #{productActualPrice}, #{cabinet}, #{door}, #{address}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{paymentTime} )
